messages.title: 1p EXTRA ON INCOME TAX...
messages.content: ...MEANS £6BILLION EXTRA TO BOOST OUR NHS AND SOCIAL CARE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1p extra on income tax to generate £6 billion extra for NHS and social care.

issues.health: 1p extra on income tax to generate £6 billion extra for NHS and social care.
issues.socialWelfare: 1p extra on income tax to generate £6 billion extra for NHS and social care.

quotes.text:
THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS
WILL PUT 1P ON INCOME TAX
TO RAISE AN EXTRA £6 BILLION FOR NHS & SOCIAL CARE

THE LIBERALS DEMOCRATS ARE
THE REAL OPPOSITION TO THE
TORIES ON THE NHS

LABOUR WON'T GIVE THE NHS THE CASH IT NEEDS.
THE TORIES WANT TO TAKE A BILLION POUNDS OUT
OF THE NHS.

images.caption: 1p extra on income tax means £6billion extra to boost our NHS and social care
